body:
repro:
 1. launch docker temporalio/auto-setup:0.21.1 
 2. execute helloworld go sample `~/temporal-go-samples$ ./bins/helloworld/starter`
 3. execute `docker run --network=host --rm temporalio/tctl:0.21.1 --ns default wf listall --open`

expected: hello world execution is listed in the output
actual: hello world is not listed

Temporal-Web shows the execution fine (see browser vs console):
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11838981/79148798-f948c780-7d7a-11ea-920f-1847bdc6944d.png)
title: tctl doesn't list open workflow execution
